thumb.title: 【ARC】MORTAL KOMBAT - SONYA
thumb.description: 真人快打モータルコンバットMortal Kombat T-Unit Rev.5.0.0(1992, MIDWAY)Character - Sonya Blade難易度・★★★★★ (Lvl.5, Hardest)Non-Tool Assisted Run1 Coin Credit, No Matches Lost===00:00 Arcade Attract Intro00:07 Character Select (Sonya Blade)00:16 Scorpion (Hanzo Hasashi)00:57 Liu Kang01:34 Sub-Zero (Bi Han)02:15 Test Your Might - Wood02:24 Johnny Cage03:07 Kano03:46 Raiden04:23 Test Your Might - Stone04:33 Sonya Blade (Mirror Match)05:15 Endurance I (Sub-Zero, Cage)06:23 Endurance II (Kano, Scorpion)07:22 Test Your Might - Steel07:32 Endurance III (Kano, Raiden)08:29 Goro09:05 Shang Tsung (Final Stage)09:54 Ending & Credits12:12 Thanks For Watching!======ご視聴感謝するThanks For Watching!
